item.title: (A Man's Gotta Know His Limitations) Briggs

item.title: All Over the World is Love (music video)
item.description: I wrote this song for Zero Defex, but they didn't seem to like it. Maybe it was too much of a pop song? I feel like if someone else sang this it could be a big hit, but what do I know?

item.title: The Rebecca Song (music video)
item.description: This is a song I wrote when I first moved to Japan. I think it's about America and how I missed it but also how I never wanted to go back to the life I had back there. Rebecca was the name of the only friend from back home who kept in touch with me when I moved. It's not about her.
item.itunes:author: Hardcore Zen: Uploads from Hardcore Zen
